To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
 (multipart/alternative)
MIME element (text/plain)
Hello The Planet, 
  
Sorry to bother you. 
  
I am contacting you regarding a domain which you are hosting named: 
 <http://www.cumfiesta-girl.com/> WWW.CUMFIESTA-GIRL.COM
<http://www.littlemidgets.com/>  
  
This website contains harmful/slanderous material to my family.  Also the domain
owner does not have permission from Jennifer to publish photos of 
her.   They do not own the rights to the photos either. 
  
Can we please work together to have the domain owner be sensitive to us/our request? 
  
We have attempted to contact the owner of the domain directly but have not been
successful in that regard.  Since the domain registry information is protected it is
difficult for me to communicate with the domain owner. 
Would you perhaps be willing to be a liaison between us and the domain owner? 
  
If you are not the hosting provider for this domain would it be possible for you to
point me in the right direction? 
  
Thank you for your time,
/* --- 
     Christopher Rumpf 
      <mailto:crumpf@parallel-evolution.com> crumpf@parallel-evolution.com 
     mobile: 619.254.0811 
     yim: mrrumpf
--- */ 
  
  
 
Friday, January 26, 2007 
 
Notification of Claimed Copyright Infringement  
 
(Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. § 512.)  
 
To: 
 
835 Greens Parkway, Suite 150
Houston , Texas 77067
Telephone: 713-400-5400
Fax: 713-942-8621 
 
1                    Name of copyright holder: Jennifer Kammerdiener 
 
2                    Name of person authorized to act on behalf of copyright 
holder: Christopher Rumpf (Spouse) 
 
3                    Identify the copyrighted work claimed to have been 
infringed:  
 
 <http://cumfiesta-celeste.cumfiesta-girl.com/>
http://cumfiesta-celeste.cumfiesta-girl.com 
 
4                    Include a representative list of such works at that 
site:  
 
 <http://cumfiesta-celeste.cumfiesta-girl.com/>
http://cumfiesta-celeste.cumfiesta-girl.com
Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing or to be the subject
of infringing activity that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled:  
 
  
 
All photos & web pages containing pictures of Jennifer Kammerdiener
(Celeste) on cumfiesta-girl.com is a personal safety issue as well as a copyright
issue.  Jennifer has had numerous stalkers in 2006 and her personal safety is being
compromised.  We have attempted to contact the owners of the cumfiesta-girl.com site
through the whois record and have not been successful.  This is an official request
to have this slanderous/offensive/harmful material permanently removed from the 
cumfiesta-girl.com domain.    cumfiesta-girl.com does not have permission 
from Jennifer to publish these photos.  Please let us know how / what else we need
to do in order to get this web content removed from cumfiesta-girl.com. 
cumfiesta-girl.com does not own the copyrights to these photos.  They need to be
removed ASAP as in accordance with the DMCA. 
 
 
6. Name of complaining party:  
 
Jennifer Kammerdiener 
 
Christopher Rumpf 
 
 
7. Address:  
 
2803 Copley Ave San Diego CA 92116 
 
 
8. Phone:  
 
619.254.0811 (mobile) 
 
 
8. E-mail:  
 
crumpf@parallel-evolution.com 
 
 
  
 
  
 
  
 
I hereby affirm, as the complaining party, that I believe in good faith that the use
of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
holder, its agent or the law.  
 
I hereby affirm, under penalty of perjury, that the information contained in this
notification is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the holder of
the exclusive right that I claim to be infringed.  
 
Signature of person authorized to act Date: __Christopher Rumpf 1/10/07________
